## making the dates in format YYYY-MM-DD
library(lubridate)

hot_days$Start_Date <- ym(hot_days$Start_Date)

cold_days$Start_date <- ym(cold_days$Start_Date)


## reading in data tables 
library(readr)

View(cold_days)
